about_page_content-1: Zero Waste GPT: A New Era in the Zero Waste Movement with Artificial Intelligence
about_page_content-2: As the Zero Waste Foundation, we are bringing nature and technology together on our journey toward a sustainable future. Our AI-powered project, Zero Waste GPT, was launched to raise awareness about zero waste and to encourage individuals and institutions to be part of this transformation.
about_page_content-3: Zero Waste GPT is an AI-based information and guidance platform that provides 24/7 support on topics such as recycling, waste management, eco-friendly habits, sustainable living tips, and zero waste regulations.
about_page_content-4: With its user-friendly structure, it provides information in a way that everyone can understand, raises awareness through educational content, and supports both individual and institutional transformation processes with solution-oriented guidance.
about_page_content-5: With this project, zero waste practices will spread in every area from homes to municipalities, schools to workplaces; the environmental awareness of young people and children will be strengthened; and a more livable world will be made possible through environmentally compatible technological solutions.
about_page_content-6: Zero waste is no longer a choice, but a necessity. Zero Waste GPT makes this necessity easy, accessible, and inspiring.
about_page_content-7: Be a part of this transformation to shape the future together!
about_page_content-9: "In harmony with nature, moving forward with technologyâ€¦"
